messages.text: Hello! How can I assist you with your IoT device connectivity today?
I want to connect my smart light.
Which IoT device are you trying to connect?
It's a smart light.
Would you like to connect your device via Wi-Fi or Ethernet?
Wi-Fi
Could you provide your Wi-Fi network name, please?
HomeNetwork
Please enter your Wi-Fi password.
The password didn't work.
I encountered an error connecting your device.
I'd like to modify my Wi-Fi settings.
Would you like to retry entering your Wi-Fi details or modify them?
I want to change the network name.
Could you provide your Wi-Fi network name, please?
HomeNetwork
Please enter your Wi-Fi password.
password123
Your device is now successfully connected to the Wi-Fi network!
That's all, thank you.
Okay, if you need any further assistance, feel free to ask. Have a great day!

nodes.label: greeting
utterances: Hello! How can I assist you with your IoT device connectivity today?

nodes.label: ask_device
utterances: Which IoT device are you trying to connect?

nodes.label: ask_connectivity_method
utterances: Would you like to connect your device via Wi-Fi or Ethernet?

nodes.label: setup_wifi
utterances: Could you provide your Wi-Fi network name, please?
Please enter your Wi-Fi network name.

nodes.label: setup_password
utterances: Please enter your Wi-Fi password.

nodes.label: confirm_connection
utterances: Your device is now successfully connected to the Wi-Fi network!
Your device is now successfully connected to the Ethernet network!

nodes.label: connection_error
utterances: I encountered an error connecting your device.

nodes.label: modify_wifi
utterances: Would you like to retry entering your Wi-Fi details or modify them?

nodes.label: setup_ethernet
utterances: Please connect your device to the Ethernet cable and let me know when you're ready.

nodes.label: exit
utterances: Okay, if you need any further assistance, feel free to ask. Have a great day!
i want to connect my smart light.
it's a smart light.
wi-fi
homenetwork
the password didn't work.
password123
i'd like to modify my wi-fi settings.
i want to change the network name.
that's all, thank you.
